t:
“Do not go outside,”
the emergency broadcast said.



“Do not listen to their cries for help, no matter how human they sound,” it also said.
c:
I mean, the minorities are never considered human.



#outside #emergency #broadcast #warning #inhuman #impersonation #lock #capture





If only we had listened and not gone outside, we would have flattened the curve already.

There's a lot of inspiration for this one, including lockdown, minorities and 'moonstruck'.
